attributes.action: award an OBE to Peter Purvis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Peter has, for many years, been a servant to the British publish. He first came to fame on Doctor Who in the 1960s and followed that with his best known role as presenter of BBC's Blue Peter programme. 

The Blue Peter Trinity of Noakes, Purves and Singleton is an enduring memory for anyone who was a child in the 1970s.

He followed this with an amazing career in sports tv (Kick Start, Crufts, Darts), comedy (The Office, I'm Alan Partridge) and motivational speaking.

The undersigned believe it is about time this man was honoured.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
